property.Oracle RAC: The same value should be set for all instances.

section:
CLONEDB should be set on Direct NFS Client CloneDB databases. When this parameter is set, the CloneDB database uses the database backup as the backing store for the datafiles.

See Also:

  • See Oracle Database Administrator's Guide for more information about cloning databases on network attached storage (NAS).

  • "CLONEDB_DIR"
seealso:
• See Oracle Database Administrator's Guide for more information about cloning databases on network attached storage (NAS).

  • "CLONEDB_DIR"
